targets.expr: avg by (envId, systemId) (otac_read_performance{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",} and on(systemId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (envId, systemId) (otac_write_performance{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",} and on(systemId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"})

sum by (systemId, envId) (increase(otac_read_data_volume_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$__range]) and on(systemId, envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"})

sum by (systemId, envId) (increase(otac_write_data_volume_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$__range]) and on(systemId, envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"})

sum by (systemId, envId) (increase(otac_read_components_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$__range]) and on(systemId, envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"})

sum by (systemId, envId) (increase(otac_write_components_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$__range]) and on(systemId, envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"})

sum(round(increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range])))  by (severity, componentType) > 0 or sum by (severity, componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) != 0 )

sum(round(increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range])))  by (severity, componentType) > 0 or sum by (severity, componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) != 0 )

sum by (severity, envId) (round(sum by (severity, envId, componentType) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) > 0)) or sum by (envId, severity, componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) != 0 ))

sum by (severity, envId) (round(sum by (severity, envId, componentType) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) > 0)) or sum by (envId, severity, componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) != 0 ))

avg by (componentType) ((rate(fuse_alert_lasted_time_total:rate_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null"}[$__range]) > 0) / (rate(fuse_alert_count_total:rate_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null"}[$__range]) > 0) or max  by (componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_lasted_time_total:max_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null"}[$__range]) != 0)) / 60

sum(increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]))  by (componentType) > 0 or sum by (componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[$__range]) != 0)

sum by (severity) (round(sum by (severity, envId, componentType) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[${barInterval}]) > 0)) or sum by (envId, severity, componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[${barInterval}]) != 0 ))

sum by (severity) (round(sum by (severity, envId, componentType) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[${barInterval}]) > 0)) or sum by (envId, severity, componentType) (max_over_time(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING", componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH"}[${barInterval}]) != 0 ))

count by (envId, systemId) (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) < 0.95) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId, systemId) (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) >= 0.95) and (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) <= 0.99) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId, systemId) (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) >= 0.99) and (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) <= 0.995) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId, systemId) (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) > 0.995) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId) (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) < 0.95) or (0 * (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId) (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) >= 0.95) and (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) <= 0.99) or (0 * (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId) (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) >= 0.99) and (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) <= 0.995) or (0 * (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId) (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) >= 0.95) and (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) / sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s])) <= 0.995) or (0 * (sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

floor(sum by (systemId, envId) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", systemId=~"[[systemId]]", severity="WARNING"}[$__range]))) + floor(sum by (systemId, envId) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", systemId=~"[[systemId]]", severity="ERROR"}[$__range])))

floor(sum by (envId) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="ERROR"}[$__range]))) + floor(sum by (envId) (increase(fuse_alert_count_total:max_1h{componentType!~"OTAC_.*|HEALTH", envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]|null", severity="WARNING"}[$__range])))

count by (envId, systemId) (avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]) < 0.1) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId, systemId) ((avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]) >= 0.1) and (avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]) <= 0.5)) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId, systemId) ((avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]) >= 0.51) and (avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]) <= 0.9)) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${__range_s}s]))))

count by (envId, systemId) ((avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]) > 0.9)) or (0 * (sum by (envId, systemId) (sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",}[${__range_s}s]))))

floor(avg by (envId) (avg_over_time(system_env:perf:avg_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[${barInterval}]) * 100) or 0 * (count by (envId) (count_over_time(fuse_system_active:count_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[${barInterval}]))))

floor(sum by (envId) (sum_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[${barInterval}])) / (sum by (envId)(sum_over_time(fuse_system_active:sum_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[${barInterval}]))) * 100) or 0 * (sum by (envId) (count_over_time(fuse_system_active:count_1h{systemId=~"[[systemId]]", envId=~"[[envId]]"}[${barInterval}])))

max(otcs_resource_disk_space_used{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"} and on(systemId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}) by (systemId, mountpoint) / max(otcs_resource_disk_space_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"} and on(systemId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}) by (systemId, mountpoint)

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from environment
list.label: Environment
list.name: envId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from environment

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from system

list.name: systemId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from system
